summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to an FBI official, requesting the transfer of all case files from the FBI's Florida office related to the investigations of Jeffrey Epstein and an associated individual. The request is made to support an ongoing SDNY investigation and to ensure compliance with discovery obligations.

persons.name: Scott
persons.context: The recipient of the email, an FBI official being asked to assist with shipping case files from Florida to New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The primary subject of the open investigation being conducted by the SDNY and FBI New York.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: The sender of the email, an AUSA from SDNY who is coordinating the request for case files to support the ongoing investigation.

connections.person1: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
connections.description: The AUSA is making a formal request to the FBI official (Scott) for the transfer of investigative files.

connections.person1: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
connections.description: The AUSA is part of the SDNY team conducting an open investigation into Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: SDNY Request for Epstein Case Files
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney from the Southern District of New York sends an email formally requesting the FBI's Florida office to ship all case files related to the investigations of Jeffrey Epstein and an associated individual to New York.
personsInvolved: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York

locations: U.S. Attorney's Office, Southern District of New York
One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The Southern District of New York (SDNY) had an open investigation into Jeffrey Epstein as of May 2019, conducted in partnership with FBI New York.

SDNY prosecutors formally requested the complete case files from the FBI's prior Florida investigation into Epstein and a related individual to ensure a complete record for their investigation and future discovery.
The requested materials included official case files and several boxes of agent work-product from the Florida investigation.
The email indicates the investigation was active and potentially heading toward criminal charges, necessitating thorough discovery preparation.
